summary: Standalone mod, new follower Emelia who is an archery trainer, potential spouse and stewart (contains all shown textures and meshes)
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img803/84/tesv1grau.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img259/5776/coollogocom132055183.png[/IMG]
[b][color=#009933]
This is my first follower mod, but it\'s completely standalone, it contains armor and weapon, as well as own face and body textures.
Emelia is a strong archer follower who is therefore also able to train you. She can be found in the Dead Man\'s Drink in Falkreath. She starts at level 10 increases with the player and caps at 100. She\'s not only a new follower and trainer, but also a potential spouse and stewart for the manors from Hearthfire dlc. Download section contains english and german file.
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img526/6788/tesv20130506122331642.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img17/627/coollogocom256471456.png[/IMG]
It\'s recommended to simply use Nexus Mod Manager.
Or download manually and extract the file, copy the .esp and all folders 
to <the elder scrolls v skyrim/data> and merge with any existing folder.[/color][/b]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img811/888/tesv2opt.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img17/7587/coollogocom248623414.png[/IMG]
[b][color=#009933]
InsanitySorrow for his awesome bow
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29143//?/] Silver Bow [/url]
apachii for her massive hair collection
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168//?/] apachii hair [/url]
Hein84 for his great retextures
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35092//?/] apachii natural retexture [/url]
dimon99 for his awesome UNP body
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709//?/] UNP body [/url]
hellosanta for her excellent female retexture
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267//?/] SG female retexture [/url]
Psyke23 for the brilliant armor texture
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4708//?/] Triss armor [/url]
[/color][/b]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img4/7942/tesv4grau.jpg[/IMG]
[/center]
author: Ztikul
